entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, described as feeling unreal.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: A hippogriff, tethered to a tree behind Hagrid's pumpkin patch. It seems to know something is happening.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper, who is trying to get Harry and his friends to leave quickly.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as being present at the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as being present at the scene.

relationships.description: Hagrid is trying to calm Buckbeak down, saying 'It's okay, Beaky'.
Hagrid tells Ron and his friends to leave quickly.
Hagrid tells Ron and his friends to leave quickly, including Hermione.
